ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It IS a big deal if it is also affecting the spell. I believe ENchanters and Shamans get the spell. (not sure about shamans) To cast the spell requires 1)
ygData.messageBody:
>the mask's UV affect. While its not a big deal it is a bug and we should
>probably send it in.

It IS a big deal if it is also affecting the spell. I believe ENchanters and
Shamans get the spell. (not sure about shamans) To cast the spell requires
1)
memming it (Enchanters usually have enough spells needed that this spell
would get swapped in and out) and 2) mana. If it is going to continually be
dropped...


You might want to try the song that gives Infravision and see if it affects
someone
that has Serpent Sight up as well.

Also, if an Enchanter has Illusion: dark elf up, does this song affect THAT
Ultravision?
